sentences.en: After we arrived in Jerusalem, the brethren received us gladly.
sentences.cn: 徒21:17到了耶路撒冷 、 兄们欢欢喜喜的接待我们.

sentences.en: And Joseph knew his brethren, but they knew not him.
sentences.cn: 8约瑟认得他哥哥们, 他们却不认得他.

sentences.en: And said, I pray you, brethren, do not so wickedly.
sentences.cn: 7说, 众弟兄, 请你们不要作这恶事.

sentences.en: And you brethren, like Isaac, are children of promise.
sentences.cn: 加4:28弟兄们 、 我们是凭著应许作儿女 、 如同以撒一样.

sentences.en: Brethren are going to feel intensely need to react to our call.
sentences.cn: 弟兄姊妹将会强烈地感到需要去回应对我们的呼召.

sentences.en: Brethren, let every man , wherein he is called, therein abide with God.
sentences.cn: 24弟兄们, 你们各人蒙召的时候是什么身分,仍要在神面前守住这身分.

sentences.en: But ye, brethren, be not weary in well doing.
sentences.cn: 13弟兄们, 你们行善不可丧志.

sentences.en: Dear brethren in the Name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
sentences.cn: 我们主耶稣基督名内亲爱的弟兄们.

sentences.en: It was natural that he should emulate his brethren.
sentences.cn: 他应当胜过他的教友们,这是很自然的.

sentences.en: Presider: Pray , brethren, that sacrifice acceptable to God, the almighty Father.
sentences.cn: 各位弟兄请你们祈祷, 望全能的天主圣父, 收纳我和你们共同奉献的圣祭.

sentences.en: The shy men may be the very brethren of David.
sentences.cn: 那些羞怯男人大概就是大卫的教友们.

sentences.en: Therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith.
sentences.cn: 所以弟兄们， 我们在一切困苦患难之中， 因着你们的信心就得了安慰。

sentences.en: Those of our brethren were now at rest.
sentences.cn: 我们那些弟兄们现在已经死去了.

sentences.en: We have called by different names brethren of the same principle.
sentences.cn: 我们主义相同的弟兄们,曾被冠以各种不同的称号.

sentences.en: We must help our brethren, it is our duty.
sentences.cn: 我们必须帮助我们的教友，这是我们的责任。

sentences.en: Wherefore, my brethren, when ye come together to eat, tarry one for another.
sentences.cn: 所以我弟兄们，你们聚会吃的时候，要彼此等待。

trans.tran_en: used to address or talk about the members of an organization or group, especially a religious group
